TextBody:
Hi Taylor,

We will have to change the certificate from the backend of the server.
For this, we will need to access it via SSH, so we can copy the new certificate over the old one with WinSCP.
Are you available on Monday for a remote session for this? If so, please let me know what your timezone is so I can schedule it.

Very important, please make sure SSH access is enabled to the VM.

Best regards,
Botond Biro | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.
